text: Matthew David Cameron (born November 28, 1962 in San Diego, California) is an American drummer best known as the drummer in Soundgarden and Pearl Jam. In September 1986, Matt Cameron had become so popular in the local Seattle music scene that he was chosen to play for Soundgarden. He replaced drummer Scott Sundquist. Cornell said, "When I first met Matt, he was already the best drummer in town...He just seemed very confident and well- adjusted.""Soundgarden". Kerrang!. May 29, 1996. He also worked briefly with The Smashing Pumpkins. In 1998, he played drums for Pearl Jam's Yield Tour. Later he joined the band as a permanent member. == References == Category:American drummers Category:Soundgarden Category:Musicians from San Diego Category:American rock musicians Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Pearl Jam
title: Matt Cameron
